summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text: Clarendon is a city in Donley County, Texas, United States. The population was 1,974 at the 2000 census. The county seat of Donley County, Clarendon is located on United States Highway 287 in the Texas Panhandle, 60 miles east of Amarillo.
title: Clarendon, Texas
